      Setting Request Attribute
      RouteContext RouteContext.badRequest()
      Set current response http code 400

      Send body to client
      RouteContext RouteContext.contentType(String contentType)
      Setting Response ContentType
      RouteContext RouteContext.cookie(String name, String value)
      Add Cookie
      RouteContext RouteContext.cookie(String name, String value, int maxAge)
      Setting Cookie
      RouteContext RouteContext.header(String name, String value)
      Set current response header

      Render by html
      RouteContext RouteContext.json(Object bean)
      Render by json

      Render by json

      Render view And Setting Data, can be modified after WebHook
      RouteContext RouteContext.render(String view)
      Render view, can be modified after WebHook
      RouteContext RouteContext.status(int statusCode)
      Setting Response Status
      RouteContext RouteContext.text(String text)
      Render by text
